Name: Gentle Bow
LongDescription: May restore the PP of one of the Pokémon's moves upon taking damage. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Seel and Dewgong.  Finding a Gentle Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
